brand_identity.name: Blessed Belly
brand_identity.mission: Faith-informed metabolic habit app for busy Christian women.

scale.h1: text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-medium tracking-tight leading-tight
scale.caption: text-sm text-muted-foreground tracking-wide uppercase

usage.primary: Main actions (Save, Submit), Active states, Key highlights
usage.background: Main page background - avoid pure white #FFFFFF, use #FAF9F6
usage.surface: Cards and containers - use white or very pale beige

layout.grid_strategy: Use 'Bento' grid for dashboard: uneven, organic shapes. Avoid rigid excel-like grids.

buttons.style: rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium transition-all duration-300 ease-out

cards.style: bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-sm p-6 md:p-8 hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors

inputs.style: rounded-xl border-border bg-white/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary px-4 py-3

navigation.style: backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 border-b border-border/50 sticky top-0 z-50

hero.usage: Hero section background or main visual

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with 'stroke-width={1.5}' for a lighter, elegant look.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Do not build a generic SaaS. This is a sanctuary for users. Every interaction should feel like a deep breath.
instructions_to_main_agent.dashboard: The Dashboard is NOT a data dump. It is a 'Daily Rhythm' center. Prioritize the 'Check-in' question. Make it the hero.
instructions_to_main_agent.trigger_library: Use a grid of soothing cards. Do not use 'Alarm' red colors. Use soft Terracotta or Sage for urgency.
instructions_to_main_agent.onboarding: Keep sign-up flows very simple. Use 'stepper' logic with encouraging copy (e.g., 'One step closer to peace').
instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is sufficient on the soft pastel backgrounds. Use dark charcoal (#2C332E) for text, never pure black.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
